RecipeDef.label: Butcher Corpse
RecipeDef.description: Butchers a corpse to obtain its meat in usable form.

RecipeDef.label: Make Stone Blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts a stone chunk into usable stone blocks. Produces 20 sand and 5 rubble as a by-product.

RecipeDef.label: Make Stone Blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts a stone chunk into usable stone blocks. Produces 20 sand and 5 rubble as a by-product.

RecipeDef.label: Saw Wood Planks
RecipeDef.description: Saws wood logs into planks. Quite slow. Produces 15.

RecipeDef.label: Saw Wood Planks
RecipeDef.description: Saws wood logs into planks. Quite fast. Produces 30.

RecipeDef.label: Saw Bamboo Planks
RecipeDef.description: Saw bamboo logs into bamboo planks. Quite slow. Produces 15.

RecipeDef.label: Saw Bamboo Planks
RecipeDef.description: Saws bamboo logs into bamboo planks. Quite fast. Produces 30.

RecipeDef.label: Chop Wood Kindling
RecipeDef.description: Chop wood logs or bamboo logs into kindling. Quite slow. Produces 15.

RecipeDef.label: Chop Wood Kindling
RecipeDef.description: Chop wood logs or bamboo logs into kindling. Quite fast. Produces 30.

RecipeDef.label: Make Charcoal
RecipeDef.description: Burn wood logs or bamboo into charcoal. Quite slow. Produces 20.

RecipeDef.label: Make Charcoal
RecipeDef.description: Burn wood logs or bamboo logs into charcoal. Quite fast. Produces 20.

RecipeDef.label: Smelt Metal from Slag
RecipeDef.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from slag chunks.

RecipeDef.label: Smelt Metal from Weapon
RecipeDef.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from weapons.

RecipeDef.label: Make Electronic Components
RecipeDef.description: Make electronic components. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Make Integrated Circuits
RecipeDef.description: Make integrated circuits. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Make Microchip Integrated Circuit
RecipeDef.description: Make a microchip integrated circuit. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Make BioElectronic Device
RecipeDef.description: Make a BioElectronic device. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Make BioDiesel Fuel
RecipeDef.description: Make BioDiesel fuel from bean pods. Produces 10.

RecipeDef.label: Make Clay Bricks
RecipeDef.description: Makes clay bricks by baking soft clay. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Recycle Apparel into Textiles
RecipeDef.description: Shreds apparel and reforms it into useable textiles. Output is based upon material used.

RecipeDef.label: Make Glass Batch
RecipeDef.description: Make glass batch from sand. Produces 10.

RecipeDef.label: Make Glass Frames
RecipeDef.description: Make glass frames from glass batch. Produces 6.

RecipeDef.label: Make Reinforced Glass Frames
RecipeDef.description: Turn fragile glass frames into reinforced glass frames by adding sythetic fibers. Produces 6.

RecipeDef.label: Mix Concrete
RecipeDef.description: Mixes sand and rubble into concrete. Produces 15.

RecipeDef.label: Mix Concrete
RecipeDef.description: Mixes sand and rubble into concrete. Produces 15.

RecipeDef.label: Make Mulch
RecipeDef.description: Make mulch from wood logs, nitre and ash. Produces 20.

RecipeDef.label: Make Cloth
RecipeDef.description: Make cloth from raw cotton. Produces 20.

RecipeDef.label: Make Weed Cloth (Hemp)
RecipeDef.description: Turn your weed into a useful textile called hemp. Produces 15.

RecipeDef.label: Make Synthread Cloth
RecipeDef.description: Make synthread cloth from raw cotton and synthetic fibers. Produces 10.

RecipeDef.label: Make Devilstrand Cloth
RecipeDef.description: Make devilstrand cloth from synthetic fibers. Produces 15.

RecipeDef.label: Make Hyperweave Cloth
RecipeDef.description: Make hyperweave cloth from synthread and devilstrand cloth. Produces 10.

RecipeDef.label: Extract BioMatter from Corpse
RecipeDef.description: Extracts BioMatter from a corpse. Produces 15.

RecipeDef.label: Make Ethanol Fuel
RecipeDef.description: Make ethanol fuel from raw corn, wheat or rice. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Make Silicon
RecipeDef.description: Melts down sand to extract the silicon from it. Quite fast. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Make Artificial Bones
RecipeDef.description: Makes artificial bones from metal and plastic. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Grow Natural Eye
RecipeDef.description: Grow a natural eye from BioMatter. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Grow Natural Ear
RecipeDef.description: Grow a natural ear from BioMatter. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Grow Natural Nose
RecipeDef.description: Grow a natural nose from BioMatter. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Grow Natural Heart
RecipeDef.description: Grow a natural heart from BioMatter. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Grow Natural Lung
RecipeDef.description: Grow a natural lung from BioMatter. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Grow Natural Liver
RecipeDef.description: Grow a natural liver from BioMatter. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Grow Natural Kidney
RecipeDef.description: Grow a natural kidney from BioMatter. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Grow Natural Stomach
RecipeDef.description: Grow a natural stomach from BioMatter. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Make Scyther Blade Prothesis
RecipeDef.description: Make a scyther blade prosthesis from an ulta solid alloy. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Herbal Medicine
RecipeDef.description: Crafts herbal medicine from Raw Healroot. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Make Herbal Medical Kit
RecipeDef.description: Combines herbs into a medical kit. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Medicine
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a medicine kit from herbal medicines. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Make Life Support Device
RecipeDef.description: Makes a life support device. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Advanced Medicine
RecipeDef.description: Crafts advanced medicine from 'medical' plants. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Make Soylent Green
RecipeDef.description: Make Soylent Green from a humanlike corpse. Produces 25.

RecipeDef.label: Perform Autopsy
RecipeDef.description: Doctors can hone their skills by testing their techniques on corpses.

RecipeDef.label: Fabricate Alpha Poly
RecipeDef.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to assemble artifical elements. Produces 15.

RecipeDef.label: Fabricate Beta Poly
RecipeDef.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to assemble artifical elements. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Synthesize Magnetic Material
RecipeDef.description: Synthesize strong magnetic material from magnetic metals. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Synthesize BioSynthetic Material
RecipeDef.description: Synthesize high ductility BioSynthetic material. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Make Mineral Sonar Module
RecipeDef.description: Make a mineral sonar module using metal alloy for the packaging box and electronic components for the computing module. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Refine Crude Oil
RecipeDef.description: Refine crude oil into useable materials. Produces 35 polymers, 23 fuel, 10 sand, 5 sulphates, 2 paraffins and 3 synthetic ammonia.

RecipeDef.label: Make Plastic
RecipeDef.description: Make plastic from polymers. Produces 10.

RecipeDef.label: Make Rubber
RecipeDef.description: Make rubber from polymers and sulphates. Produces 10.

RecipeDef.label: Vulcanize Rubber
RecipeDef.description: Vulcanize rubber from caoutchouc and sulphates. Produces 10.

RecipeDef.label: Make Synthetic Fibers
RecipeDef.description: Make synthetic fibers from polymers and sulphates. Produces 5.

RecipeDef.label: Make Kevlar
RecipeDef.description: Make kevlar from plastic and synthetic fibers. Produces 10.

RecipeDef.label: Make Carbon
RecipeDef.description: Make carbon from polymers, rubber and coal ore. Produces 12.

RecipeDef.label: Make Drill Head
RecipeDef.description: Makes a drill head for use with the hi-tech drilling rig. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create a Painting
RecipeDef.description: Create a painting by using cloth and painting supplies. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create Painting Supplies
RecipeDef.description: Creates paint by boiling petals of the spectago flower until the gum and pigments bind and then combine it with wood to finish the set. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Hex-Cells
RecipeDef.description: Crafts Hex-Cells. This is a power source for some armors. Produces 10.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Compound Paste
RecipeDef.description: Crafts bottles of compound paste, used for various crafting processes. Produces 20.

RecipeDef.label: Make Robot Parts
RecipeDef.description: Make Robot Parts. Produces 25.
